duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead quoting analysts to ensure on-time renewals and compliance with company policies for renewal orders
Provide support and guidance to the renewal quoting analyst team for quote creation, revision, and nonstandard term approval
Establish relationships with team leads of adjacent functions to develop and streamline processes
Drive effectiveness and efficiency by identifying improvements to the quoting processes and tools
Ensure on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation and revisions
Ensure renewal pricing follows current policies, rules, and procedures based on configuration of the offering and instance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
Experience in Customer Success Operations, Contract Creation or Review, or similar role
Familiarity with Salesforce or similar CRM, with experience in Gainsight, NetSuite, and Walk-Me
